column2: The Goblins of the Carrion Tribe have been subdued by Ugma and are used as scouts, forced to find food or be eaten instead. They are largely ignored by the Trolls as long as they find enough food, so many still prefer this arrangement over serving orcs.

These terrifying creatures are similar in appearance to their kin the Stone Trolls but of a much darker complexion. They are attributed in myth to utter a deep guttural sound, akin to mocking laughter before they tear their prey to pieces."
